name: Timberland Jackson's Landing Waterproof Boots - Men's
description:
The Jackson's Landing boots are more than just style, they're crafted using sustainably minded materials, reducing energy use and waste production in the manufacturing process. To date, Timberland has re-purposed more than 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.Lite™ Leather upper is produced at a Leather Working Group’s (LWG) Silver-rated tannery.Seam-sealed construction for waterproof protection.Breathable ReBOTL™ linings are made with 50% recycled plastic bottles.Removable TrueCloud™ footbeds provide all-day comfort and support.Durable GripStick™ rubber outsoles grip wet and dry surfaces.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
